creator: mgainty@hotmail.com
conor@apache.org
text:
It appears you are trying to build Ant 1.5 with Ant 1.4. You can't do that since
the 1.5 build file uses features from 1.5

Try bootstrapping first and use the build.sh or build.bat scripts.
